fixes.name: Change Dv01 (USD)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau subtraction of two calculated fields into DAX by mapping each field reference to the table[column] format. The expression performs a simple subtraction between the two referenced fields.
fixes.type_changed_reason: One or more dependent calculated fields reference [Parameters] (parameter-based logic), and per rules any calculation that references parameters must be created as a measure.
